item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- ReID] Clothes-Changing Person ReID with RGB Modality Only (CVPR 2022)
item.description: Clothes-Changing Person Re-identification with RGB Modality Only (CVPR 2022) 开源代码传送门 概述 CCReID 任务。 本文旨在更好地从 RGB 模态挖掘与衣着无关的信息，而不借助额外模态，提出一种基于衣着的对抗损失 (Clothes-based Adversarial Loss, C
